Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: CLI: 'did rotate-key' CLI command should support fees
Issue.description: did rotate-key help Command: did rotate-key - Rotate keys for active did Usage: did rotate-key seed = Parameters are: seed - (optional) (leave empty for deferred input) If not provide then a random one will be created Examples: did rotate-key did rotate-key seed=00000000000000000000000000000My2 {code} did rotate-key should have optional parameters fees_inputs and fees_outputs. >
